title: Facebook privacy lawsuit over facial recognition leads to $650M settlement
text: The judge in the case signs off on the settlement, calling it one of the biggest ever in a privacy suit.

title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Added Shares Of Palantir, Twitter, And Sold Apple, Facebook On Friday
text: Cathie Wood made some more moves in tech for her Ark Invest portfolio on Friday. Wood, founder and CEO of ARK Investment Management, is a big name in the investment world — her company's portfolios have been bringing in returns of more than 100%.

title: Judge approves $650 million settlement of Facebook privacy lawsuit linked to facial photo tagging
text: A federal judge has approved a settlement in which Facebook will pay $650 million to users who sued the social media company over its tagging feature. The settlement, which is one of the largest-ever from a privacy lawsuit, was a "landmark result," said US Judge James Donato of the Northern District of California in his Friday order. About 1.6 million people who joined the lawsuit will receive a payout of at least $345, the lawsuit said.

title: Facebook Had Its Worst Quarter Ever In 2020, But Revenue Was Still Up 10%
text: How did the ad-dependent social media giant thrive in a year when a pandemic and recession made for challenging conditions?

title: Why content moderation costs billions and is so tricky for Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and others
text: After the riots at the Capitol in January, debate is swirling over how platforms like Facebook and Twitter moderate content and what's protected as free speech.

title: Judge approves $650m settlement of privacy lawsuit against Facebook
text: Nearly 1.6m Facebook users to receive at least $345 after network allegedly used face photo-tagging without permission

title: How Are Twitter And Facebook Dealing With COVID Misinformation?

title: How Facebook Is Building Trust and Confidence in COVID Vaccines
text: Facebook's Head of Health KX Jin tells us about the social media giant's campaign to connect users with vaccine information, remove debunked health claims, and support global health agencies.
